maintenance.description: Inspection and maintenance of wiring, circuit breakers, and electrical outlets. Testing and repair of emergency lighting and power systems.

maintenance.description: Periodic deep cleaning of carpets, upholstery, and air ducts. Disinfection of high-touch surfaces.
maintenance.name: DEEP CLEANING
